title: Druid
content:
our attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming Resistance and Immunity to non-magical damage. Wild Shape: Sabre-Toothed Tiger Wild Shape: Air Myrmidon Wild Shape: Earth Myrmidon Wild Shape: Fire Myrmidon Wild Shape: Water Myrmidon

Circle of the Spores

Additional cantrips Halo of Spores: Unleash a cloud of necrotic spores upon a target. This uses a reaction, so other reactions won't trigger this turn. Symbiotic Entity: Gain 4 Temporary Hit Points per Druid level and deal an addition
